instruction: Compose a poem about longing for home.
output:
Oceans apart, longing for home,
My heart so heavy, I'm all alone.

Under the stars, I gaze up high,
Dreaming of days when I didn't have to say goodbye.

Memories of home, so vivid and true,
I wish I could go back, if only I knew.

Distance so vast, never close enough,
No matter how hard, I can't get there fast enough.

Longing for home, every night and day,
Final destination is where I must stay.
